title: Dynamic_Science_Fiction_Volume_1_Number_6_
creator: Columbia Publications, Incorporated
description: Dynamic Science Fiction Volume 1, Number 6, August 1954. Published by Columbia Publications, Incorporated; 241 Church Street, New York 13, New York. Dimensions are 6 1/2" width by 9 1/2" Height and 109grams, 100 pages. Copyright was issued in 1954, but no renewal was recorded, this work is Public Domain under Rule 6 of the Copyright Statutes of the United States. Etext created by Gerard Arthus. This issue has damaged front page, spine and back cover, if someone can send me a better copy I will incorporate it into the work. Due to copyright restrictions, the article 'The Plot-Forms of Science Fiction #2' by James Gunn, has been removed from the working copy of the PDF; pages 37-48.
